title: E-Assessment Design Competency Enhancement Program Using Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Platform Usage Experience and Understanding of Language Education Assessment Tools
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning with synchronous video conferencing and asynchronous assignment submissions

learning_goals: Principles of e-assessment design combining Competency-Based Approach (CBA) and Objective-Based Approach (OBA)
Development of three smartphone-compatible e-assessment activities aligned with given language learning objectives
Establishment of learner-customized feedback strategies by analyzing formative assessment data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
